question:
You have a friend who has always liked the car you currently drive. Now you have decided to sell the car. You think your friend might be interested in buying it.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter,* say why you want to sell your car
* describe the condition of the car* invite the friend to come and see the car himself/herself someday
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I'm writing to you to let you know that I want to sell the car which you liked the most.

Firstly, I'm very delighted to tell you that I purchased a brand new car last weekend. Thus, I decided to sell the old one. As you liked it very much so I wanted you to purchase this vehicle if you desire.

It is in good condition having new tyres. Moreover, it has a better average as well. There is no problem with it except you have to change the left side mirror because it has a scratch. It is having model no CXxxxxxx and engine no 42xxxx and three-year-old.
Apart from this, it has all the related documents. Hence, I want to invite you to my home and you can check its machinery by yourself. I'll give you this automobile at reasonable prices.
Pay regards to your family from my side.
